A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie took hot garbage to a whole new level. I have idolized the star wars legacy since I can remember\, and this movie completely disgraced me and many other star wars fans. This movie was way worse than the Christmas special. I wish I could meet everyone who contributed to the entire design of this movie so I could at least get a better understanding on why this movie turned out so rancid\, disgusting\, and terrible.
